sqlMap.insert: insert into T_BC_ACCOUNT_APPLY (ID,ADDRESS, BRANCH_NO,NAME,MOBILE, APPLY_DATE,IP,CREATE_DATE) VALUES (seq_t_bc_account_apply.NEXTVAL,#address#,#branchno#,#name#,#mobile#,#applyDate#,#ip#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'))
sqlMap.delete: delete from T_BC_ACCOUNT_APPLY where ID in (#value#)
sqlMap.update: update T_BC_ACCOUNT_APPLY set ADDRESS=#address#, BRANCH_NO=#branchno#,Name=#name#,MOBILE=#mobile#, APPLY_DATE=#applyDate#,IP=#ip#,CREATE_DATE=#createdate# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_.*, ROWNUM rownum_ FROM ( $sql$ ) row_ WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE rownum_ >#begin#
